ingredients.ingredient: 2 ½ cups frozen vegetable blend (no garlic or onions), minced

cookingTips: Always verify vegetables contain no garlic or onions as they are toxic to dogs
Cool the mixture completely before serving to pets
Store in airtight containers in the refrigerator for up to 5 days
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you modify this recipe to accommodate a dog with specific dietary restrictions or allergies?
